version_description:
- Add a new function "Reverse", review by translating from Vietnamese to English.
- Change the display of "User note".
- Update user guide.
- Fix bugs and improve some other functions.

- Add a new function "Reverse", review by translating from Vietnamese to English.
- Change the display of "User note".
- Update user guide.
- Fix bugs and improve some other functions.

Now you can create a list of words that you want to learn.
(Open Incoming list -> tap on icon "+")

You also can create a list by web browser then import it into lazzybee app.
http://www.lazzybee.com/editor/#group

- Now you can recover 1 day streak.
